reviewText: Excellent instruction and a great introduction to tying these classic flies.  Don Bastian provides a thorough yet approachable teaching style and makes even a neophite feel capable enough to tackle these beautiful flies.  Get both  DVDs if you can.

Don Bastian's video are detailed. I have all three of his videos, two on wet flies and this one on traditional streamers. Don is best expert on Ray Bergman's wet fly patterns and these tradional streamers.
